mapper.select: select m.id id,m.student_id studentId,s.name studentName,d.name dormitoryName,m.reason reason,m.create_date createDate from moveout m,student s,dormitory d where m.student_id = s.id and m.dormitory_id = d.id;

select m.id id,m.student_id studentId,s.name studentName,d.name dormitoryName,m.reason reason,m.create_date createDate from moveout m,student s,dormitory d where m.student_id = s.id and m.dormitory_id = d.id and s.name like concat('%',#{value},'%');
